citations.narrative:
In building 4, there was a pallet containing approximately 10 bags of Templeton rabbit pellets of which 4 were covered
with mixture of loose pellets and approximately 20-30 rodent droppings. Rodent droppings were also scattered in the
areas between the bags, but the present bags had not been chewed opened. Supplies of food and bedding shall be
stored in facilities which adequately protect the supplies against infestation or contamination by vermin.
Correct by: 09/04/2024

In building 3, a French drain was blocked and the back-up of feces and water covered an area approximately 6 ft long by
2 ft wide along the base of the wall. The suspended rabbit enclosures with rabbits, were approximately 3ft from the fecal
material. Provisions shall be made for the removal and disposal of animal and food wastes, bedding, dead animals, and
debris.
Correct by: 09/04/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n
